propertyName.ja: 積算ガス消費量計測値
propertyName.en: Cumulative amount of gas consumption measurement value

descriptions.ja: 積算ガス消費量を0.001m3 で示す。
descriptions.en: This property indicates cumulative amount of gas consumption in units of 0.001 m3.

propertyName.ja: 積算ガス消費量計測値履歴
propertyName.en: Cumulative amounts of gas consumption measurement log

descriptions.ja: 毎正時及び、毎正時から30分経過した時刻における積算ガス消費量計測値の24時間分の履歴を示す。
descriptions.en: This property indicates cumulative amount of gas consumption measurement value log for past 24 hours at every hour on the hour and at the following 30 minutes.
